net.sf.mmm.service.impl.gwt.server

Class RemoteInvocationGenericServiceServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.google.gwt.user.server.rpc.AbstractRemoteServiceServlet
          • com.google.gwt.user.server.rpc.RemoteServiceServlet
            • net.sf.mmm.service.impl.gwt.server.RemoteInvocationGenericServiceServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.RemoteService, com.google.gwt.user.server.rpc.SerializationPolicyProvider, Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig, RemoteInvocationGenericServiceGwt, GenericRemoteInvocationRpcService, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.web.context.ServletContextAware, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.Controller

    @Named(value="RemoteInvocationGenericServiceServlet")
public class RemoteInvocationGenericServiceServlet
extends com.google.gwt.user.server.rpc.RemoteServiceServlet
implements RemoteInvocationGenericServiceGwt, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.Controller, org.springframework.web.context.ServletContextAware
    This is the RemoteServiceServlet that implements the RemoteInvocationGenericServiceGwt using spring-webmvc in order to allow context and dependency-injection (CDI). The actual implementation for callServices(GenericRemoteInvocationRpcRequest) is delegated to an injected implementation - by default GenericRemoteInvocationRpcServiceImpl but can be changed by overriding the spring XML configuration.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
